comment._content: any names of the people in the picture availiable?

comment.author: 54403180@N04
comment._content: Sorry CdnDiva, there are no first names given for this image either. We do know that these Mallons were residents of Allaturk? (this word is somewhat illegible in the business records), Richhill, County Armagh though...if that helps at all. The picture was taken on 30th October 1942.
comment.authorname: Public Record Office of Northern Ireland
